resources.string: This component will be the class of AppCompatImageView which is customizable to display Avatar
This component will be the class of View which is customizable to display status of the user
This component will be the class of LinearLayout which is customizable to display the unread count of the messages in conversations.
This component will be the class of RecyclerView which is customizable to display list of users
This component will be the class of RecyclerView which is customizable to display list of groups
This component will be the class of RecyclerView which is customizable to display list of recent conversation
UI Unified directly launches a fully function chat experience within your app. It contains all the features a standard chat application has and reduces the development time and effort considerably.

UI Screens are individual screens that can be used independently within your app to suit your requirements. These screens are fully function stand-alone screens which can be used to achieve specific use cases and reduce the development efforts considerably.
It show\'s list of component which users can use at their end to create thier own chat app within minutes.
This component will be the class of RecyclerView which is customizable to display list of calls.
This component is a custom component it includes three tabs which show images,videos & files.
